name: simple-options-trader
description: A comprehensive trading platform with real-time stock and options trading

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../shadcn-ui && npm install
scripts.build: cd backend && npm run build && cd ../shadcn-ui && npm run build
scripts.lint: cd backend && npm run lint && cd ../shadcn-ui && npm run lint
scripts.format: cd backend && npm run format && cd ../shadcn-ui && npm run format
scripts.test: cd backend && npm test && cd ../shadcn-ui && npm test
